universal_guidelines: FORCE DARK MODE: This site is Dark Mode only. Do not build a Light Mode toggle.
No generic centered text blocks. Use 'Grid' layouts to stagger content.
Use 'Gold' sparingly. It is an accent for value, not a background paint.
Spacing is Luxury. Use 'py-24' or 'py-32' between sections.
Borders must be subtle: border-white/10, never border-white.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND COLORS: Override the 'primary' and 'accent' colors in tailwind.config.js with the Hex codes provided.
3. BUILD HERO: Use the 'Golden Digital Wave' image as a background with a heavy radial gradient overlay so text pops.
4. PRICING: The Premium card must have a 'Gold Glow' effect (box-shadow).
5. AUTH: Use Shadcn Dialog for Login/Signup. Do not redirect to a separate page if possible, keep them immersed.
